Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Southbound Reroute near Clark/Monroe
ShortDescription: SB 56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Washington, LaSalle and Madison, due to street blockage near Clark/Monroe.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Washington, LaSalle and Madison, due to street blockage near Clark/Monroe.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #9 Ashland & #X9 Ashland Express Temporary Reroute at Ashland/46th
ShortDescription: 9 Ashland & X9 Ashland Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 43rd, Western, 47th, and Ashland due to, a fire near Ashland/46th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#9 Ashland & #X9 Ashland Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 43rd, Western, 47th, and Ashland due to, a fire near Ashland/46th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Delays Affecting Brown Line Trains
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are experiencing moving delays leaving Kimball. Expect longer than usual wait times.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are experiencing moving delays leaving Kimball. Expect longer than usual wait times.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Please allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Service Delayed at Halsted
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing at Halsted due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing at Halsted due to a sick customer.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
